```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/runanywhere/startup_hackathon20/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-308)
package com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.background
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.rememberLazyListState
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.CircleShape
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Send
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.draw.clip
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20.ui.theme.Startup_hackathon20Theme

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 Startup_hackathon20Theme {
 ChatScreen()
 }
 }
 }
}

// Feminine color palette
val SoftPink = Color(0xFFFCE4EC)
val RosePink = Color(0xFFF8BBD9)
val DeepRose = Color(0xFFE91E63)
val LavenderBlue = Color(0xFFE1BEE7)
val SoftPurple = Color(0xFFF3E5F5)
val WarmWhite = Color(0xFFFFFBFE)

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun ChatScreen(viewModel: ChatViewModel = viewModel()) {
 val messages by viewModel.messages.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by viewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val downloadProgress by viewModel.downloadProgress.collectAsState()
 val currentModelId by viewModel.currentModelId.collectAsState()
 val statusMessage by viewModel.statusMessage.collectAsState()

 var inputText by remember { mutableStateOf("") }

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(
 brush = Brush.verticalGradient(
 colors = listOf(SoftPink, WarmWhite)
 )
 )
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Custom App Bar
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 color = Color.Transparent
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 20.dp, vertical = 16.dp)
 .statusBarsPadding(),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.Center
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "✨ AI Assistant",
 fontSize = 24.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose
 )
 }
 }

 // Status bar with elegant design
 if (downloadProgress != null || statusMessage != "Ready to chat!") {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 8.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = LavenderBlue.copy(alpha = 0.3f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = statusMessage,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 downloadProgress?.let { progress ->
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 LinearProgressIndicator(
 progress = { progress },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(10.dp)),
 color = DeepRose,
 trackColor = SoftPurple
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 // Messages List
 val listState = rememberLazyListState()

 LazyColumn(
 state = listState,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)
 ) {
 if (messages.isEmpty() && currentModelId != null) {
 item {
 WelcomeMessage()
 }
 }

 items(messages) { message ->
 MessageBubble(message)
 }
 }

 // Auto-scroll to bottom when new messages arrive
 LaunchedEffect(messages.size) {
 if (messages.isNotEmpty()) {
 listState.animateScrollToItem(messages.size - 1)
 }
 }

 // Input Field with elegant design
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(16.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(25.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 8.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 TextField(
 value = inputText,
 onValueChange = { inputText = it },
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 placeholder = {
 Text(
 "Type your message...",
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.6f)
 )
 },
 enabled = !isLoading && currentModelId != null,
 colors = TextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 focusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp)
 )

 FloatingActionButton(
 onClick = {
 if (inputText.isNotBlank()) {
 viewModel.sendMessage(inputText)
 inputText = ""
 }
 },
 modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
 containerColor = DeepRose,
 contentColor = Color.White,
 elevation = FloatingActionButtonDefaults.elevation(
 defaultElevation = 6.dp
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Send,
 contentDescription = "Send",
 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun WelcomeMessage() {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = LavenderBlue.copy(alpha = 0.2f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.padding(20.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = " Hello Beautiful!",
 fontSize = 20.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 Text(
 text = "I'm your AI assistant, ready to help with anything you need. Ask me questions, have a conversation, or let me help you with tasks!",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.8f),
 lineHeight = 20.sp
 )
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun MessageBubble(message: ChatMessage) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (message.isUser) Arrangement.End else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 280.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(
 topStart = 20.dp,
 topEnd = 20.dp,
 bottomStart = if (message.isUser) 20.dp else 4.dp,
 bottomEnd = if (message.isUser) 4.dp else 20.dp
 ),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = if (message.isUser) {
 DeepRose
 } else {
 WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 }
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = if (message.isUser) "You" else "✨ AI",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 } else {
 DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
 },
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
 Text(
 text = message.text,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White
 } else {
 Color.Black.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 },
 lineHeight = 20.sp
 )
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable

 Startup_hackathon20Theme {
 ChatScreen()
 }
}
```

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Perfect! I've made the requested refinements:

## ✨ **Changes Made:**

### **1. Updated Welcome Message:**
- **Simplified text**: Changed from "Hello Beautiful!" to "Hey girl, I am here to help you."
- **Pill shape**: Replaced the card design with a rounded pill-shaped background
- **No gray bands**: Clean, transparent surface with subtle rose background
- **Centered layout**: Properly centered with elegant padding

### **2. Dynamic Input Positioning:**
- **Navigation detection**: Added logic to detect if the device is using gesture navigation vs. button navigation
- **Smart positioning**: 
 - **Gesture mode**: Input box sits lower (24dp bottom padding)
 - **Button mode**: Input box positioned above navigation bar with `navigationBarsPadding()`
- **Automatic adjustment**: The app automatically adapts based on the device's navigation style

### **3. Technical Implementation:**
- **WindowInsets detection**: Uses Android's WindowInsets API to detect navigation bar height
- **Dynamic modifier**: Conditionally applies navigation bar padding only when needed
- **Performance optimized**: Detection runs once using `LaunchedEffect`

The app now has a cleaner, more refined look with the simple pill-shaped welcome message and intelligent input positioning that adapts to different Android navigation modes. Ready for your next set of refinements! "}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<user_query>
is it possible to take the inputs from the user in a form and then bring that to the input box automatically. just tell me..
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Yes, absolutely! There are several ways to implement this:

## **Possible Approaches:**

### **1. Modal Form Dialog:**
- User taps a button → Opens a form dialog
- Form has multiple fields (name, preferences, goals, etc.)
- After submission → Converts form data to a structured prompt
- Auto-fills the input box with the generated prompt

### **2. Bottom Sheet Form:**
- Swipe up or tap to reveal a bottom sheet
- Form slides up from bottom with various input fields
- Submit → Creates a formatted message in the input box

### **3. Multi-step Form Wizard:**
- Series of cards/screens that collect different info
- Each step builds the final prompt
- Final step shows preview and sends to input box

### **4. Quick Action Buttons:**
- Pre-defined form templates (e.g., "Health Question", "Recipe Request", "Advice Needed")
- Tap button → Opens relevant form
- Fill form → Auto-generates contextual prompt

### **5. Voice-to-Form:**
- User speaks → Speech-to-text fills form fields
- Form data → Structured prompt in input box

## **Benefits:**
- **Better context**: Structured input gives AI more specific information
- **User-friendly**: Easier than typing long prompts
- **Consistency**: Standardized format for better AI responses
- **Personalization**: Can save user preferences

Would you like me to implement one of these approaches? Which style appeals to you most for your feminine-themed app?"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/runanywhere/startup_hackathon20/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-338)
package com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.background
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.rememberLazyListState
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.CircleShape
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Send
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.draw.clip
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalConfiguration
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.text.style.TextAlign
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
import androidx.core.view.ViewCompat
import androidx.core.view.WindowInsetsCompat
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20.ui.theme.Startup_hackathon20Theme

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 Startup_hackathon20Theme {
 ChatScreen()
 }
 }
 }
}

// Feminine color palette
val SoftPink = Color(0xFFFCE4EC)
val RosePink = Color(0xFFF8BBD9)
val DeepRose = Color(0xFFE91E63)
val LavenderBlue = Color(0xFFE1BEE7)
val SoftPurple = Color(0xFFF3E5F5)
val WarmWhite = Color(0xFFFFFBFE)

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun ChatScreen(viewModel: ChatViewModel = viewModel()) {
 val messages by viewModel.messages.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by viewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val downloadProgress by viewModel.downloadProgress.collectAsState()
 val currentModelId by viewModel.currentModelId.collectAsState()
 val statusMessage by viewModel.statusMessage.collectAsState()

 var inputText by remember { mutableStateOf("") }

 // Check if using gesture navigation by detecting navigation bar height
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val activity = context as? ComponentActivity
 var isGestureNavigation by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }

 LaunchedEffect(Unit) {
 activity?.let {
 val rootView = it.findViewById<android.view.View>(android.R.id.content)
 val insets = ViewCompat.getRootWindowInsets(rootView)
 val navBarHeight =
 insets?.getInsets(WindowInsetsCompat.Type.navigationBars())?.bottom ?: 0
 isGestureNavigation = navBarHeight < 100 // Gesture nav typically has smaller nav bar
 }
 }

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(
 brush = Brush.verticalGradient(
 colors = listOf(SoftPink, WarmWhite)
 )
 )
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Custom App Bar
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 color = Color.Transparent
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 20.dp, vertical = 16.dp)
 .statusBarsPadding(),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.Center
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "✨ AI Assistant",
 fontSize = 24.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose
 )
 }
 }

 // Status bar with elegant design
 if (downloadProgress != null || statusMessage != "Ready to chat!") {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 8.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = LavenderBlue.copy(alpha = 0.3f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = statusMessage,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 downloadProgress?.let { progress ->
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 LinearProgressIndicator(
 progress = { progress },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(10.dp)),
 color = DeepRose,
 trackColor = SoftPurple
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 // Messages List
 val listState = rememberLazyListState()

 LazyColumn(
 state = listState,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)
 ) {
 if (messages.isEmpty() && currentModelId != null) {
 item {
 WelcomeMessage()
 }
 }

 items(messages) { message ->
 MessageBubble(message)
 }
 }

 // Auto-scroll to bottom when new messages arrive
 LaunchedEffect(messages.size) {
 if (messages.isNotEmpty()) {
 listState.animateScrollToItem(messages.size - 1)
 }
 }

 // Input Field with dynamic positioning based on navigation type
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(
 start = 16.dp,
 end = 16.dp,
 top = 16.dp,
 bottom = if (isGestureNavigation) 24.dp else 16.dp
 )
 .then(
 if (!isGestureNavigation) {
 Modifier.navigationBarsPadding()
 } else {
 Modifier
 }
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(25.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 8.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 TextField(
 value = inputText,
 onValueChange = { inputText = it },
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 placeholder = {
 Text(
 "Type your message...",
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.6f)
 )
 },
 enabled = !isLoading && currentModelId != null,
 colors = TextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 focusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp)
 )

 FloatingActionButton(
 onClick = {
 if (inputText.isNotBlank()) {
 viewModel.sendMessage(inputText)
 inputText = ""
 }
 },
 modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
 containerColor = DeepRose,
 contentColor = Color.White,
 elevation = FloatingActionButtonDefaults.elevation(
 defaultElevation = 6.dp
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Send,
 contentDescription = "Send",
 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun WelcomeMessage() {
 // Pill-shaped welcome message
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 32.dp),
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier
 .background(
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.1f),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(50.dp)
 )
 .padding(horizontal = 24.dp, vertical = 16.dp),
 color = Color.Transparent
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Hey there, how can I help you today?.",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 )
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun MessageBubble(message: ChatMessage) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (message.isUser) Arrangement.End else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 280.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(
 topStart = 20.dp,
 topEnd = 20.dp,
 bottomStart = if (message.isUser) 20.dp else 4.dp,
 bottomEnd = if (message.isUser) 4.dp else 20.dp
 ),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = if (message.isUser) {
 DeepRose
 } else {
 WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 }
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = if (message.isUser) "You" else "✨ AI",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 } else {
 DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
 },
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
 Text(
 text = message.text,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White
 } else {
 Color.Black.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 },
 lineHeight = 20.sp
 )
 }
 }
 }
}

@Preview(showBackground = true)
@Composable
fun DefaultPreview() {
 Startup_hackathon20Theme {
 ChatScreen()
 }
}
```

</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"**Excellent concept!** NutriHer for women 35+ is a brilliant niche with huge potential. Here's my analysis and enhancement suggestions:

## **Why This Is Perfect:**

### **Target Market Strengths:**
- **Underserved demographic**: Women 35+ face unique nutritional challenges (hormones, metabolism, bone health)
- **Willing to pay**: This age group values health and has disposable income
- **Trust-focused**: They prefer personalized, expert-backed advice over generic solutions

## **Core Components to Add:**

### **1. Smart Form Categories:**
- **Hormonal Health**: Menopause, PCOS, thyroid issues
- **Weight Management**: Post-pregnancy, metabolic slowdown
- **Energy & Mood**: Fatigue, stress eating, sleep issues
- **Bone & Joint Health**: Calcium, vitamin D deficiencies
- **Digestive Health**: Bloating, food sensitivities
- **Beauty from Within**: Skin, hair, nail nutrition

### **2. Progressive Form Intelligence:**
- **Health Profile Setup**: Age, activity level, medical conditions, dietary restrictions
- **Symptom Tracker**: Rate severity, duration, triggers
- **Lifestyle Context**: Work stress, family responsibilities, budget constraints
- **Goal Definition**: Weight loss, energy boost, specific health concerns

### **3. Enhanced AI Capabilities:**
- **Meal Planning**: 7-day personalized plans with shopping lists
- **Supplement Recommendations**: Age-appropriate with interaction warnings
- **Recipe Suggestions**: Quick, family-friendly, nutrient-dense
- **Progress Tracking**: Weekly check-ins and plan adjustments

### **4. Trust-Building Features:**
- **Expert Validation**: "Based on nutritional science for women 35+"
- **Source Citations**: Link to studies, medical journals
- **Gradual Implementation**: "Start with these 3 changes this week"
- **Safety First**: "Consult your doctor if..." warnings

### **5. Community & Support:**
- **Success Stories**: Anonymous case studies
- **Weekly Challenges**: Small, achievable nutrition goals
- **Expert Q&A**: Monthly sessions with nutritionists
- **Peer Support**: Safe space for questions and encouragement

## **Unique Differentiators:**

### **1. Life-Stage Specific:**
- Pre-menopause vs. menopause vs. post-menopause advice
- Working mom vs. empty nester considerations
- Budget-conscious vs. premium options

### **2. Holistic Approach:**
- Nutrition + mental health connection
- Family meal planning integration
- Time-efficient solutions for busy lifestyles

### **3. Cultural Sensitivity:**
- Various cultural dietary preferences
- Budget-friendly options for different income levels
- Regional food availability considerations

## **Advanced Features:**

### **1. Smart Notifications:**
- Hydration reminders based on activity
- Meal prep day suggestions
- Supplement timing alerts

### **2. Integration Potential:**
- Fitness app connectivity
- Grocery delivery service partnerships
- Lab result interpretation (with medical disclaimers)

### **3. Monetization Opportunities:**
- Premium meal plans and recipes
- Supplement partnerships (affiliate)
- One-on-one expert consultations
- Corporate wellness programs

## **UI/UX Enhancements for NutriHer:**
- **Warm, nurturing color palette** (you're already on track!)
- **Progress visualization**: Beautiful charts and milestones
- **Photo food diary**: AI-powered meal analysis
- **Voice input**: "I'm feeling bloated after lunch..."

This concept has incredible potential - it's specific enough to serve the target market exceptionally well, yet broad enough for sustainable growth. The form-to-AI approach is perfect for creating that personalized experience women in this age group crave.

**Ready to build something amazing?** "}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"## **NutriHer App Features List:**

### **Core Features:**
1. **Smart Health Assessment Forms**
 - Hormonal health questionnaire
 - Lifestyle & dietary preferences
 - Current symptoms tracker
 - Health goals definition

2. **AI-Powered Personalized Advice**
 - Custom nutrition recommendations
 - Meal planning suggestions
 - Supplement guidance
 - Lifestyle modifications

3. **Form-to-Chat Integration**
 - Forms automatically generate AI prompts
 - Structured data collection
 - Context-aware conversations

4. **Progress Tracking**
 - Weekly check-ins
 - Symptom monitoring
 - Goal achievement tracking

### **Enhanced Features:**
5. **Recipe & Meal Planning**
 - Age-appropriate recipes
 - Shopping list generation
 - Family-friendly options

6. **Educational Content**
 - Nutrition tips for 35+ women
 - Hormonal health insights
 - Evidence-based recommendations

7. **Reminder System**
 - Meal timing notifications
 - Supplement reminders
 - Hydration alerts

8. **Profile Management**
 - Health history storage
 - Preference settings
 - Progress history

---

## **File Structure Recommendation:**

### **For a Professional App (Recommended):**
```
app/src/main/java/com/nutriher/
├── MainActivity.kt (Main container)
├── ChatViewModel.kt (Existing)
├── forms/
│ ├── FormViewModel.kt
│ ├── HealthAssessmentForm.kt
│ ├── LifestyleForm.kt
│ └── SymptomTrackerForm.kt
├── components/
│ ├── FormComponents.kt
│ ├── ChatComponents.kt
│ └── ProfileComponents.kt
├── data/
│ ├── UserProfile.kt
│ ├── FormData.kt
│ └── LocalStorage.kt
└── utils/
 ├── FormToPromptConverter.kt
 └── NotificationHelper.kt
```

### **For Quick Prototype (Possible but not recommended):**
- **Yes, you CAN put everything in MainActivity.kt**
- **But it would become 2000+ lines and unmaintainable**

---

## **My Recommendation:**

### **Phase 1 - MVP (Start Simple):**
- Keep chat functionality in MainActivity.kt
- Add 2-3 basic forms in separate composables
- Create FormViewModel for form logic
- Basic form-to-prompt conversion

### **Phase 2 - Scale Up:**
- Separate files for different features
- Add database for user profiles
- Implement notifications
- Enhanced UI components

### **Why Separate Files?**
1. **Maintainability**: Easier to debug and modify
2. **Team Collaboration**: Multiple developers can work simultaneously 
3. **Reusability**: Components can be reused across screens
4. **Performance**: Smaller compilation units
5. **Testing**: Easier to unit test individual components

---

## **Quick Start Approach:**

**Option 1: Everything in MainActivity (Quick & Dirty)**
- 1 file, ~1500-2000 lines
- Fast to prototype
- Hard to maintain later

**Option 2: Modular Structure (Professional)**
- 8-10 files, ~200-300 lines each
- Takes slightly longer initially
- Scales beautifully

**My suggestion: Start with Option 2** - it's only slightly more work upfront but saves months of headaches later when adding features.

Would you like me to start implementing the modular structure, or do you want to try the single-file approach first?"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

### **Implementation Strategy:**

- **4-5 essential questions** (age, main concern, lifestyle, goals)
- **Smart prompt generation** (converts form answers to detailed AI prompt)
- **One-click experience** (form → auto-send to AI)

### **Hackathon Advantages:**
✅ **Demo-friendly**: Judges can see the full flow in 2 minutes 
✅ **Impressive UX**: Forms + AI feels like a complete product 
✅ **Differentiated**: Most hackathon projects are basic chat apps 
✅ **Target-specific**: Shows you understand the 35+ women market 

### **File Structure:**
```
MainActivity.kt (~800-1000 lines)
├── Color Palette & Theme (existing)
├── Form Data Classes (new)
├── Enhanced ChatViewModel (existing + form logic)
├── Main ChatScreen (existing)
├── HealthAssessmentForm Composable (new)
├── Form Bottom Sheet (new)
├── Enhanced MessageBubble (existing)
└── Form-to-Prompt Logic (new)
```

This approach will give you a **complete, impressive prototype** that showcases the NutriHer concept perfectly for judges while being totally manageable in a hackathon timeframe.

</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"## **For a Hackathon Prototype: NO Database Needed!**

### **Why Skip Database for Now:**

✅ **Speed**: No setup time, no configuration headaches 
✅ **Simplicity**: One file, pure local state 
✅ **Demo Focus**: Judges care about functionality, not data persistence 
✅ **Less Bugs**: No network issues, authentication problems, or sync errors 
✅ **Hackathon Perfect**: Get the core idea working first 

### **What You'll Use Instead:**
- **Local State**: `remember { mutableStateOf() }` for form data
- **ViewModel**: Keep user profile in memory during session
- **Shared Preferences**: If you need basic persistence (name, preferences)

---

## **Post-Hackathon: Then Add Database**

### **For Production Version:**
**Firebase/Firestore would be perfect because:**
- **User Profiles**: Health history, preferences, progress
- **Chat History**: Previous conversations and recommendations 
- **Progress Tracking**: Weekly assessments, symptom logs
- **Personalization**: Learn from user interactions
- **Multi-device**: Access from phone/tablet/web

### **Quick Migration Path:**
```kotlin
// Hackathon (Local)
var userProfile by remember { mutableStateOf(UserProfile()) }

// Production (Firebase)
// Just replace with Firebase calls later
```

---

## **Hackathon Strategy:**

### **What Judges Will See:**
1. User fills health form ✅
2. Form converts to smart AI prompt ✅ 
3. AI gives personalized nutrition advice ✅
4. Beautiful, targeted UI for 35+ women ✅

### **What They Won't Miss:**
- Data doesn't persist between app restarts
- No user accounts or login
- No chat history saved

**Result**: Full functionality demo without database complexity!

---

## **My Recommendation:**
**Skip database for hackathon.** Focus on making the form-to-AI flow absolutely perfect. That's your winning differentiator - not data persistence.

**After hackathon**: Add Firebase in ~2 hours for the production version.

Ready to build the core prototype without database distractions? "}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

## **NutriHer - Complete Features:**

### ** Hackathon-Ready Features:**

- **Welcome Message**: Encourages users to start assessment

- **Beautiful branding**: " NutriHer" with feminine iconography

- **Error handling**: Graceful error messages and loading states

### ** Demo Flow for Judges:**

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/runanywhere/startup_hackathon20/ChatViewModel.kt, lines=ALL(1-142)
package com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20

import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
import androidx.lifecycle.viewModelScope
import com.runanywhere.sdk.public.RunAnywhere
import com.runanywhere.sdk.public.extensions.listAvailableModels
import com.runanywhere.sdk.models.ModelInfo
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow
import kotlinx.coroutines.launch

// Simple Message Data Class
data class ChatMessage(
 val text: String,
 val isUser: Boolean
)

// ViewModel
class ChatViewModel : ViewModel() {

 private val _messages = MutableStateFlow<List<ChatMessage>>(emptyList())
 val messages: StateFlow<List<ChatMessage>> = _messages

 private val _isLoading = MutableStateFlow(false)
 val isLoading: StateFlow<Boolean> = _isLoading

 private val _downloadProgress = MutableStateFlow<Float?>(null)
 val downloadProgress: StateFlow<Float?> = _downloadProgress

 private val _currentModelId = MutableStateFlow<String?>(null)
 val currentModelId: StateFlow<String?> = _currentModelId

 private val _statusMessage = MutableStateFlow<String>("Initializing...")
 val statusMessage: StateFlow<String> = _statusMessage

 // Default model to use
 private val defaultModelId = "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k"

 init {
 initializeDefaultModel()
 }

 private fun initializeDefaultModel() {
 viewModelScope.launch {
 try {
 _statusMessage.value = "Setting up AI model..."

 // Get available models
 val models = listAvailableModels()

 // Debug: Log all available models
 models.forEach { model ->
 println("Available model: ID='${model.id}', Name='${model.name}', Downloaded=${model.isDownloaded}")
 }

 // Try different possible IDs for the Qwen model
 val possibleIds = listOf(
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k",
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k.gguf",
 "Qwen 2.5 0.5B Instruct Q6_K",
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k.gguf"
 )

 val targetModel = models.find { model ->
 possibleIds.any { id -> model.id.equals(id, ignoreCase = true) }
 } ?: models.find { model ->
 model.name.contains("Qwen", ignoreCase = true)
 }

 if (targetModel == null) {
 _statusMessage.value =
 "Qwen model not found. Available models: ${models.map { "${it.name} (${it.id})" }}"
 return@launch
 }

 println("Selected model: ID='${targetModel.id}', Name='${targetModel.name}'")

 // Check if model is already downloaded
 if (!targetModel.isDownloaded) {
 // Download the model
 _statusMessage.value = "Downloading AI model (374 MB)..."
 RunAnywhere.downloadModel(targetModel.id).collect { progress ->
 _downloadProgress.value = progress
 _statusMessage.value = "Downloading: ${(progress * 100).toInt()}%"
 }
 _downloadProgress.value = null
 }

 // Load the model
 _statusMessage.value = "Loading AI model..."
 val success = RunAnywhere.loadModel(targetModel.id)
 if (success) {
 _currentModelId.value = targetModel.id
 _statusMessage.value = "Ready to chat!"
 } else {
 _statusMessage.value = "Failed to load AI model"
 }

 } catch (e: Exception) {
 _statusMessage.value = "Error setting up AI: ${e.message}"
 _downloadProgress.value = null
 }
 }
 }

 fun sendMessage(text: String) {
 if (_currentModelId.value == null) {
 _statusMessage.value = "AI model not ready"
 return
 }

 // Add user message
 _messages.value += ChatMessage(text, isUser = true)

 viewModelScope.launch {
 _isLoading.value = true

 try {
 // Generate response with streaming
 var assistantResponse = ""
 RunAnywhere.generateStream(text).collect { token ->
 assistantResponse += token

 // Update assistant message in real-time
 val currentMessages = _messages.value.toMutableList()
 if (currentMessages.lastOrNull()?.isUser == false) {
 currentMessages[currentMessages.lastIndex] =
 ChatMessage(assistantResponse, isUser = false)
 } else {
 currentMessages.add(ChatMessage(assistantResponse, isUser = false))
 }
 _messages.value = currentMessages
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 _messages.value += ChatMessage("Error: ${e.message}", isUser = false)
 }

 _isLoading.value = false
 }
 }
}

```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/runanywhere/startup_hackathon20/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-845)
package com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20

import android.os.Bundle

import com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20.ui.theme.Startup_hackathon20Theme
import com.runanywhere.sdk.public.RunAnywhere
import com.runanywhere.sdk.public.extensions.listAvailableModels
import com.runanywhere.sdk.models.ModelInfo
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow
import kotlinx.coroutines.launch

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 Startup_hackathon20Theme {
 ChatScreen()
 }
 }
 }
}

// Feminine color palette
val SoftPink = Color(0xFFFCE4EC)
val RosePink = Color(0xFFF8BBD9)
val DeepRose = Color(0xFFE91E63)
val LavenderBlue = Color(0xFFE1BEE7)
val SoftPurple = Color(0xFFF3E5F5)
val WarmWhite = Color(0xFFFFFBFE)

// Form Data Classes
data class HealthProfile(
 val name: String = "",
 val age: String = "",
 val primaryConcern: String = "",
 val activityLevel: String = "",
 val dietaryRestrictions: String = "",
 val currentSymptoms: List<String> = emptyList(),
 val healthGoals: String = "",
 val timeAvailable: String = ""
)

data class ChatMessage(val text: String, val isUser: Boolean)

// Enhanced ChatViewModel with Form Support
class EnhancedChatViewModel : ViewModel() {

 // Chat functionality (copied from ChatViewModel)
 private val _messages = MutableStateFlow<List<ChatMessage>>(emptyList())
 val messages: StateFlow<List<ChatMessage>> = _messages

 private val _isLoading = MutableStateFlow(false)
 val isLoading: StateFlow<Boolean> = _isLoading

 private val _downloadProgress = MutableStateFlow<Float?>(null)
 val downloadProgress: StateFlow<Float?> = _downloadProgress

 private val _currentModelId = MutableStateFlow<String?>(null)
 val currentModelId: StateFlow<String?> = _currentModelId

 private val _statusMessage = MutableStateFlow<String>("Initializing...")
 val statusMessage: StateFlow<String> = _statusMessage

 // Default model to use
 private val defaultModelId = "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k"

 // Form-specific state
 private val _userProfile = mutableStateOf(HealthProfile())
 val userProfile: State<HealthProfile> = _userProfile

 private val _showHealthForm = mutableStateOf(false)
 val showHealthForm: State<Boolean> = _showHealthForm

 init {
 initializeDefaultModel()
 }

 private fun initializeDefaultModel() {
 viewModelScope.launch {
 try {
 _statusMessage.value = "Setting up AI model..."

 // Get available models
 val models = listAvailableModels()

 // Debug: Log all available models
 models.forEach { model ->
 println("Available model: ID='${model.id}', Name='${model.name}', Downloaded=${model.isDownloaded}")
 }

 // Try different possible IDs for the Qwen model
 val possibleIds = listOf(
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k",
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k.gguf",
 "Qwen 2.5 0.5B Instruct Q6_K",
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k.gguf"
 )

 val targetModel = models.find { model ->
 possibleIds.any { id -> model.id.equals(id, ignoreCase = true) }
 } ?: models.find { model ->
 model.name.contains("Qwen", ignoreCase = true)
 }

 if (targetModel == null) {
 _statusMessage.value =
 "Qwen model not found. Available models: ${models.map { "${it.name} (${it.id})" }}"
 return@launch
 }

 println("Selected model: ID='${targetModel.id}', Name='${targetModel.name}'")

 // Check if model is already downloaded
 if (!targetModel.isDownloaded) {
 // Download the model
 _statusMessage.value = "Downloading AI model (374 MB)..."
 RunAnywhere.downloadModel(targetModel.id).collect { progress ->
 _downloadProgress.value = progress
 _statusMessage.value = "Downloading: ${(progress * 100).toInt()}%"
 }
 _downloadProgress.value = null
 }

 // Load the model
 _statusMessage.value = "Loading AI model..."
 val success = RunAnywhere.loadModel(targetModel.id)
 if (success) {
 _currentModelId.value = targetModel.id
 _statusMessage.value = "Ready to chat!"
 } else {
 _statusMessage.value = "Failed to load AI model"
 }

 } catch (e: Exception) {
 _statusMessage.value = "Error setting up AI: ${e.message}"
 _downloadProgress.value = null
 }
 }
 }

 fun sendMessage(text: String) {
 if (_currentModelId.value == null) {
 _statusMessage.value = "AI model not ready"
 return
 }

 // Add user message
 _messages.value += ChatMessage(text, isUser = true)

 viewModelScope.launch {
 _isLoading.value = true

 try {
 // Generate response with streaming
 var assistantResponse = ""
 RunAnywhere.generateStream(text).collect { token ->
 assistantResponse += token

 // Update assistant message in real-time
 val currentMessages = _messages.value.toMutableList()
 if (currentMessages.lastOrNull()?.isUser == false) {
 currentMessages[currentMessages.lastIndex] =
 ChatMessage(assistantResponse, isUser = false)
 } else {
 currentMessages.add(ChatMessage(assistantResponse, isUser = false))
 }
 _messages.value = currentMessages
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 _messages.value += ChatMessage("Error: ${e.message}", isUser = false)
 }

 _isLoading.value = false
 }
 }

 fun updateProfile(profile: HealthProfile) {
 _userProfile.value = profile
 }

 fun showForm() {
 _showHealthForm.value = true
 }

 fun hideForm() {
 _showHealthForm.value = false
 }

 fun generatePromptFromProfile(profile: HealthProfile): String {
 return buildString {
 append("I'm a ${profile.age}-year-old woman named ${profile.name}. ")
 append("My main health concern is: ${profile.primaryConcern}. ")
 append("My activity level is ${profile.activityLevel}. ")

 if (profile.dietaryRestrictions.isNotBlank()) {
 append("I have these dietary restrictions: ${profile.dietaryRestrictions}. ")
 }

 if (profile.currentSymptoms.isNotEmpty()) {
 append("I'm currently experiencing: ${profile.currentSymptoms.joinToString(", ")}. ")
 }

 append("My health goals are: ${profile.healthGoals}. ")
 append("I have ${profile.timeAvailable} available for meal prep and exercise. ")
 append("Please provide personalized nutrition advice and recommendations specific to my situation as a woman over 35.")
 }
 }
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun ChatScreen(viewModel: EnhancedChatViewModel = viewModel()) {
 val messages by viewModel.messages.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by viewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val downloadProgress by viewModel.downloadProgress.collectAsState()
 val currentModelId by viewModel.currentModelId.collectAsState()
 val statusMessage by viewModel.statusMessage.collectAsState()
 val showHealthForm by viewModel.showHealthForm
 val userProfile by viewModel.userProfile

 var inputText by remember { mutableStateOf("") }

 // Check if using gesture navigation by detecting navigation bar height
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val activity = context as? ComponentActivity
 var isGestureNavigation by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }

 LaunchedEffect(Unit) {
 activity?.let {
 val rootView = it.findViewById<android.view.View>(android.R.id.content)
 val insets = ViewCompat.getRootWindowInsets(rootView)
 val navBarHeight =
 insets?.getInsets(WindowInsetsCompat.Type.navigationBars())?.bottom ?: 0
 isGestureNavigation = navBarHeight < 100
 }
 }

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(
 brush = Brush.verticalGradient(
 colors = listOf(SoftPink, WarmWhite)
 )
 )
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Custom App Bar
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 color = Color.Transparent
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 20.dp, vertical = 16.dp)
 .statusBarsPadding(),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween
 ) {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(48.dp))
 Text(
 text = " NutriHer",
 fontSize = 24.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose
 )
 // Health Assessment Button
 FloatingActionButton(
 onClick = { viewModel.showForm() },
 modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
 containerColor = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.1f),
 contentColor = DeepRose,
 elevation = FloatingActionButtonDefaults.elevation(
 defaultElevation = 2.dp
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Add,
 contentDescription = "Health Assessment",
 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 )
 }
 }
 }

 // Status bar with elegant design
 if (downloadProgress != null || statusMessage != "Ready to chat!") {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 8.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = LavenderBlue.copy(alpha = 0.3f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = statusMessage,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 downloadProgress?.let { progress ->
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 LinearProgressIndicator(
 progress = { progress },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(10.dp)),
 color = DeepRose,
 trackColor = SoftPurple
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 // Messages List
 val listState = rememberLazyListState()

 LazyColumn(
 state = listState,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)
 ) {
 if (messages.isEmpty() && currentModelId != null) {
 item {
 WelcomeMessage(onStartAssessment = { viewModel.showForm() })
 }
 }

 items(messages) { message ->
 MessageBubble(message)
 }
 }

 // Auto-scroll to bottom when new messages arrive
 LaunchedEffect(messages.size) {
 if (messages.isNotEmpty()) {
 listState.animateScrollToItem(messages.size - 1)
 }
 }

 // Input Field with dynamic positioning
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(
 start = 16.dp,
 end = 16.dp,
 top = 16.dp,
 bottom = if (isGestureNavigation) 24.dp else 16.dp
 )
 .then(
 if (!isGestureNavigation) {
 Modifier.navigationBarsPadding()
 } else {
 Modifier
 }
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(25.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 8.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 TextField(
 value = inputText,
 onValueChange = { inputText = it },
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 placeholder = {
 Text(
 "Ask about nutrition, wellness, or use the + button for assessment...",
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.6f)
 )
 },
 enabled = !isLoading && currentModelId != null,
 colors = TextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 focusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp)
 )

 FloatingActionButton(
 onClick = {
 if (inputText.isNotBlank()) {
 viewModel.sendMessage(inputText)
 inputText = ""
 }
 },
 modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
 containerColor = DeepRose,
 contentColor = Color.White,
 elevation = FloatingActionButtonDefaults.elevation(
 defaultElevation = 6.dp
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Send,
 contentDescription = "Send",
 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 // Health Assessment Bottom Sheet
 if (showHealthForm) {
 HealthAssessmentBottomSheet(
 currentProfile = userProfile,
 onDismiss = { viewModel.hideForm() },
 onSubmit = { profile ->
 viewModel.updateProfile(profile)
 viewModel.hideForm()
 val prompt = viewModel.generatePromptFromProfile(profile)
 viewModel.sendMessage(prompt)
 }
 )
 }
 }
}

 activityLevels.forEach { level ->

@Composable
fun MessageBubble(message: ChatMessage) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (message.isUser) Arrangement.End else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 280.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(
 topStart = 20.dp,
 topEnd = 20.dp,
 bottomStart = if (message.isUser) 20.dp else 4.dp,
 bottomEnd = if (message.isUser) 4.dp else 20.dp
 ),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = if (message.isUser) {
 DeepRose
 } else {
 WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 }
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = if (message.isUser) "You" else " NutriHer",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 } else {
 DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
 },
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
 Text(
 text = message.text,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White
 } else {
 Color.Black.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 },
 lineHeight = 20.sp
 )
 }
 }
 }
}
```

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/runanywhere/startup_hackathon20/MainActivity.kt, lines=ALL(1-845)
class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 Startup_hackathon20Theme {
 ChatScreen()
 }
 }
 }

// Feminine color palette
val SoftPink = Color(0xFFFCE4EC)
val RosePink = Color(0xFFF8BBD9)
val DeepRose = Color(0xFFE91E63)
val LavenderBlue = Color(0xFFE1BEE7)
val SoftPurple = Color(0xFFF3E5F5)
val WarmWhite = Color(0xFFFFFBFE)

// Form Data Classes
data class HealthProfile(
 val name: String = "",
 val age: String = "",
 val primaryConcern: String = "",
 val activityLevel: String = "",
 val dietaryRestrictions: String = "",
 val currentSymptoms: List<String> = emptyList(),
 val healthGoals: String = "",
 val timeAvailable: String = ""
)

data class ChatMessage(val text: String, val isUser: Boolean)

// Enhanced ChatViewModel with Form Support
class EnhancedChatViewModel : ViewModel() {

 // Chat functionality (copied from ChatViewModel)
 private val _messages = MutableStateFlow<List<ChatMessage>>(emptyList())
 val messages: StateFlow<List<ChatMessage>> = _messages

 private val _isLoading = MutableStateFlow(false)
 val isLoading: StateFlow<Boolean> = _isLoading

 private val _downloadProgress = MutableStateFlow<Float?>(null)
 val downloadProgress: StateFlow<Float?> = _downloadProgress

 private val _currentModelId = MutableStateFlow<String?>(null)
 val currentModelId: StateFlow<String?> = _currentModelId

 private val _statusMessage = MutableStateFlow<String>("Initializing...")
 val statusMessage: StateFlow<String> = _statusMessage

 // Default model to use
 private val defaultModelId = "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k"

 // Form-specific state
 private val _userProfile = mutableStateOf(HealthProfile())
 val userProfile: State<HealthProfile> = _userProfile

 private val _showHealthForm = mutableStateOf(false)
 val showHealthForm: State<Boolean> = _showHealthForm

 init {
 initializeDefaultModel()
 }

 private fun initializeDefaultModel() {
 viewModelScope.launch {
 try {
 _statusMessage.value = "Setting up AI model..."

 // Get available models
 val models = listAvailableModels()

 // Debug: Log all available models
 models.forEach { model ->
 println("Available model: ID='${model.id}', Name='${model.name}', Downloaded=${model.isDownloaded}")
 }

 // Try different possible IDs for the Qwen model
 val possibleIds = listOf(
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k",
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k.gguf",
 "Qwen 2.5 0.5B Instruct Q6_K",
 "qwen2.5-0.5b-instruct-q6_k.gguf"
 )

 val targetModel = models.find { model ->
 possibleIds.any { id -> model.id.equals(id, ignoreCase = true) }
 } ?: models.find { model ->
 model.name.contains("Qwen", ignoreCase = true)
 }

 if (targetModel == null) {
 _statusMessage.value =
 "Qwen model not found. Available models: ${models.map { "${it.name} (${it.id})" }}"
 return@launch
 }

 println("Selected model: ID='${targetModel.id}', Name='${targetModel.name}'")

 // Check if model is already downloaded
 if (!targetModel.isDownloaded) {
 // Download the model
 _statusMessage.value = "Downloading AI model (374 MB)..."
 RunAnywhere.downloadModel(targetModel.id).collect { progress ->
 _downloadProgress.value = progress
 _statusMessage.value = "Downloading: ${(progress * 100).toInt()}%"
 }
 _downloadProgress.value = null
 }

 // Load the model
 _statusMessage.value = "Loading AI model..."
 val success = RunAnywhere.loadModel(targetModel.id)
 if (success) {
 _currentModelId.value = targetModel.id
 _statusMessage.value = "Ready to chat!"
 } else {
 _statusMessage.value = "Failed to load AI model"
 }

 } catch (e: Exception) {
 _statusMessage.value = "Error setting up AI: ${e.message}"
 _downloadProgress.value = null
 }
 }
 }

 fun sendMessage(text: String) {
 if (_currentModelId.value == null) {
 _statusMessage.value = "AI model not ready"
 return
 }

 // Add user message
 _messages.value += ChatMessage(text, isUser = true)

 viewModelScope.launch {
 _isLoading.value = true

 try {
 // Generate response with streaming
 var assistantResponse = ""
 RunAnywhere.generateStream(text).collect { token ->
 assistantResponse += token

 // Update assistant message in real-time
 val currentMessages = _messages.value.toMutableList()
 if (currentMessages.lastOrNull()?.isUser == false) {
 currentMessages[currentMessages.lastIndex] =
 ChatMessage(assistantResponse, isUser = false)
 } else {
 currentMessages.add(ChatMessage(assistantResponse, isUser = false))
 }
 _messages.value = currentMessages
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 _messages.value += ChatMessage("Error: ${e.message}", isUser = false)
 }

 _isLoading.value = false
 }
 }

 fun updateProfile(profile: HealthProfile) {
 _userProfile.value = profile
 }

 fun showForm() {
 _showHealthForm.value = true
 }

 fun hideForm() {
 _showHealthForm.value = false
 }

 fun generatePromptFromProfile(profile: HealthProfile): String {
 return buildString {
 append("I'm a ${profile.age}-year-old woman named ${profile.name}. ")
 append("My main health concern is: ${profile.primaryConcern}. ")
 append("My activity level is ${profile.activityLevel}. ")

 if (profile.dietaryRestrictions.isNotBlank()) {
 append("I have these dietary restrictions: ${profile.dietaryRestrictions}. ")
 }

 if (profile.currentSymptoms.isNotEmpty()) {
 append("I'm currently experiencing: ${profile.currentSymptoms.joinToString(", ")}. ")
 }

 append("My health goals are: ${profile.healthGoals}. ")
 append("I have ${profile.timeAvailable} available for meal prep and exercise. ")
 append("Please provide personalized nutrition advice and recommendations specific to my situation as a woman over 35.")
 }
 }
}

 Card(

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 ) {
 if (messages.isEmpty() && currentModelId != null) {
 item {

 }

 items(messages) { message ->

 // Auto-scroll to bottom when new messages arrive
 LaunchedEffect(messages.size) {
 if (messages.isNotEmpty()) {
 listState.animateScrollToItem(messages.size - 1)
 }
 }

 // Input Field with dynamic positioning
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(
 start = 16.dp,
 end = 16.dp,
 top = 16.dp,
 bottom = if (isGestureNavigation) 24.dp else 16.dp
 )
 .then(
 if (!isGestureNavigation) {
 Modifier.navigationBarsPadding()
 } else {
 Modifier
 }
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(25.dp),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 8.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 TextField(
 value = inputText,
 onValueChange = { inputText = it },
 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 placeholder = {
 Text(
 "Ask about nutrition, wellness, or use the + button for assessment...",
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.6f)
 )
 },
 enabled = !isLoading && currentModelId != null,
 colors = TextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
 focusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 unfocusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp)
 )

 FloatingActionButton(
 onClick = {
 if (inputText.isNotBlank()) {
 viewModel.sendMessage(inputText)
 inputText = ""
 }
 },
 modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
 containerColor = DeepRose,
 contentColor = Color.White,
 elevation = FloatingActionButtonDefaults.elevation(
 defaultElevation = 6.dp
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Send,
 contentDescription = "Send",
 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 // Health Assessment Bottom Sheet
 if (showHealthForm) {
 HealthAssessmentBottomSheet(
 currentProfile = userProfile,
 onDismiss = { viewModel.hideForm() },
 onSubmit = { profile ->
 viewModel.updateProfile(profile)
 viewModel.hideForm()
 val prompt = viewModel.generatePromptFromProfile(profile)
 viewModel.sendMessage(prompt)
 }
 )
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun WelcomeMessage(onStartAssessment: () -> Unit) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 // Main welcome message
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 32.dp),
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier
 .background(
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.1f),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(50.dp)
 )
 .padding(horizontal = 24.dp, vertical = 16.dp),
 color = Color.Transparent
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Hey girl, I'm here to help you with personalized nutrition advice!",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 )
 }
 }

 // Quick assessment button
 Button(
 onClick = onStartAssessment,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(horizontal = 32.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(25.dp),
 colors = ButtonDefaults.buttonColors(
 containerColor = DeepRose,
 contentColor = Color.White
 )
 ) {
 Text(
 " Start Health Assessment",
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 8.dp)
 )
 }
 }
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun HealthAssessmentBottomSheet(
 currentProfile: HealthProfile,
 onDismiss: () -> Unit,
 onSubmit: (HealthProfile) -> Unit
) {
 var profile by remember { mutableStateOf(currentProfile) }
 val bottomSheetState = rememberModalBottomSheetState(skipPartiallyExpanded = true)

 ModalBottomSheet(
 onDismissRequest = onDismiss,
 sheetState = bottomSheetState,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxHeight(0.9f),
 containerColor = WarmWhite,
 contentColor = Color.Black,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 28.dp, topEnd = 28.dp)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(24.dp)
 .verticalScroll(rememberScrollState())
 ) {
 // Header
 Text(
 text = " Your Health Assessment",
 fontSize = 24.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = DeepRose,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 8.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = "Help me understand your unique needs as a woman over 35",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.7f),
 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 24.dp)
 )

 // Name Field
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = profile.name,
 onValueChange = { profile = profile.copy(name = it) },
 label = { Text("What should I call you?") },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(bottom = 16.dp),
 colors = OutlinedTextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedBorderColor = DeepRose,
 focusedLabelColor = DeepRose,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )

 // Age Field
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = profile.age,
 onValueChange = { profile = profile.copy(age = it) },
 label = { Text("Your age") },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(bottom = 16.dp),
 colors = OutlinedTextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedBorderColor = DeepRose,
 focusedLabelColor = DeepRose,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )

 // Primary Concern
 Text(
 text = "What's your main health concern?",
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 8.dp)
 )

 val concerns = listOf(
 "Weight management",
 "Energy & fatigue",
 "Hormonal changes",
 "Digestive issues",
 "Bone health",
 "Heart health",
 "Skin & aging"
 )

 concerns.forEach { concern ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .selectable(
 selected = profile.primaryConcern == concern,
 onClick = { profile = profile.copy(primaryConcern = concern) }
 )
 .padding(vertical = 4.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 RadioButton(
 selected = profile.primaryConcern == concern,
 onClick = { profile = profile.copy(primaryConcern = concern) },
 colors = RadioButtonDefaults.colors(selectedColor = DeepRose)
 )
 Text(
 text = concern,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(start = 8.dp)
 )
 }
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Activity Level
 Text(
 text = "How active are you?",
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 8.dp)
 )

 val activityLevels = listOf(
 "Sedentary (desk job, minimal exercise)",
 "Lightly active (light exercise 1-3 days/week)",
 "Moderately active (moderate exercise 3-5 days/week)",
 "Very active (hard exercise 6-7 days/week)"
 )

 activityLevels.forEach { level ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .selectable(
 selected = profile.activityLevel == level,
 onClick = { profile = profile.copy(activityLevel = level) }
 )
 .padding(vertical = 4.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 RadioButton(
 selected = profile.activityLevel == level,
 onClick = { profile = profile.copy(activityLevel = level) },
 colors = RadioButtonDefaults.colors(selectedColor = DeepRose)
 )
 Text(
 text = level,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(start = 8.dp),
 fontSize = 14.sp
 )
 }
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Dietary Restrictions
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = profile.dietaryRestrictions,
 onValueChange = { profile = profile.copy(dietaryRestrictions = it) },
 label = { Text("Any dietary restrictions or allergies?") },
 placeholder = { Text("e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free, dairy intolerant...") },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(bottom = 16.dp),
 colors = OutlinedTextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedBorderColor = DeepRose,
 focusedLabelColor = DeepRose,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp),
 minLines = 2
 )

 // Health Goals
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = profile.healthGoals,
 onValueChange = { profile = profile.copy(healthGoals = it) },
 label = { Text("What are your main health goals?") },
 placeholder = { Text("e.g., lose weight, increase energy, improve digestion...") },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(bottom = 16.dp),
 colors = OutlinedTextFieldDefaults.colors(
 focusedBorderColor = DeepRose,
 focusedLabelColor = DeepRose,
 cursorColor = DeepRose
 ),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp),
 minLines = 2
 )

 // Time Available
 Text(
 text = "How much time can you dedicate to meal prep weekly?",
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = DeepRose,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 8.dp)
 )

 val timeOptions = listOf(
 "Less than 2 hours",
 "2-4 hours",
 "4-6 hours",
 "More than 6 hours"
 )

 timeOptions.forEach { time ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .selectable(
 selected = profile.timeAvailable == time,
 onClick = { profile = profile.copy(timeAvailable = time) }
 )
 .padding(vertical = 4.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 RadioButton(
 selected = profile.timeAvailable == time,
 onClick = { profile = profile.copy(timeAvailable = time) },
 colors = RadioButtonDefaults.colors(selectedColor = DeepRose)
 )
 Text(
 text = time,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(start = 8.dp)
 )
 }
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(32.dp))

 // Submit Button
 Button(
 onClick = { onSubmit(profile) },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height(56.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(28.dp),
 colors = ButtonDefaults.buttonColors(
 containerColor = DeepRose,
 contentColor = Color.White
 ),
 enabled = profile.name.isNotBlank() &&
 profile.age.isNotBlank() &&
 profile.primaryConcern.isNotBlank()
 ) {
 Text(
 "✨ Get My Personalized Nutrition Plan",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun MessageBubble(message: ChatMessage) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (message.isUser) Arrangement.End else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 280.dp),
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(
 topStart = 20.dp,
 topEnd = 20.dp,
 bottomStart = if (message.isUser) 20.dp else 4.dp,
 bottomEnd = if (message.isUser) 4.dp else 20.dp
 ),
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = if (message.isUser) {
 DeepRose
 } else {
 WarmWhite.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
 }
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
 Text(
 text = if (message.isUser) "You" else " NutriHer",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 } else {
 DeepRose.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
 },
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
 Text(
 text = message.text,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = if (message.isUser) {
 Color.White
 } else {
 Color.Black.copy(alpha = 0.8f)
 },
 lineHeight = 20.sp
 )
 }
 }
 }
```
```
}

+@Composable
+fun BottomNavigationBar(
+ currentScreen: Screen,
+ isDarkMode: Boolean,
+ isGestureNavigation: Boolean,
+ onNavigate: (Screen) -> Unit,
+ onToggleTheme: () -> Unit
+) {
+ val backgroundColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkSurface else WarmCream
+ val contentColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkText else MutedPlum
+ val selectedColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkAccent else GentleViolet
+
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .then(
+ if (!isGestureNavigation) {
+ Modifier.navigationBarsPadding()
+ } else {
+ Modifier.padding(bottom = 16.dp)
+ }
+ ),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = backgroundColor),
+ elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 8.dp),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 24.dp, topEnd = 24.dp)
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(horizontal = 32.dp, vertical = 16.dp),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceEvenly,
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ // Health Assessment Button
+ Column(
+ horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .clickable { onNavigate(Screen.HealthAssessment) }
+ .padding(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = Icons.Default.Person,
+ contentDescription = "Health Assessment",
+ tint = if (currentScreen == Screen.HealthAssessment) selectedColor else contentColor,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
+ )
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ Text(
+ text = "Assessment",
+ fontSize = 12.sp,
+ color = if (currentScreen == Screen.HealthAssessment) selectedColor else contentColor,
+ fontWeight = if (currentScreen == Screen.HealthAssessment) FontWeight.Medium else FontWeight.Normal
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Chat Button
+ Column(
+ horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .clickable { onNavigate(Screen.Chat) }
+ .padding(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = Icons.Default.Chat,
+ contentDescription = "AI Chat",
+ tint = if (currentScreen == Screen.Chat) selectedColor else contentColor,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
+ )
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ Text(
+ text = "AI Chat",
+ fontSize = 12.sp,
+ color = if (currentScreen == Screen.Chat) selectedColor else contentColor,
+ fontWeight = if (currentScreen == Screen.Chat) FontWeight.Medium else FontWeight.Normal
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Theme Toggle Button
+ Column(
+ horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .clickable { onToggleTheme() }
+ .padding(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = if (isDarkMode) Icons.Default.LightMode else Icons.Default.DarkMode,
+ contentDescription = "Toggle Theme",
+ tint = contentColor,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
+ )
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ Text(
+ text = if (isDarkMode) "Light" else "Dark",
+ fontSize = 12.sp,
+ color = contentColor,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
+@Composable
+fun ChatScreen(
+ viewModel: EnhancedChatViewModel,
+ isDarkMode: Boolean
+) {
+ val messages by viewModel.messages.collectAsState()
+ val isLoading by viewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
+ val downloadProgress by viewModel.downloadProgress.collectAsState()
+ val currentModelId by viewModel.currentModelId.collectAsState()
+ val statusMessage by viewModel.statusMessage.collectAsState()
+
+ var inputText by remember { mutableStateOf("") }
+
+ val backgroundColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkBackground else SoftLavender
+ val surfaceColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkSurface else WarmCream
+ val textColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkText else Color.Black
+ val accentColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkAccent else GentleViolet
+
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
+ ) {
+ // Custom App Bar
+ Surface(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ color = Color.Transparent
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(horizontal = 20.dp, vertical = 16.dp)
+ .statusBarsPadding(),
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.Center
+ ) {
+ Text(
+ text = " NutriHer Chat",
+ fontSize = 24.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
+ color = accentColor
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Status bar with elegant design
+ if (downloadProgress != null || statusMessage != "Ready to chat!") {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 8.dp),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkSurface else PaleLilac.copy(alpha = 0.5f)
+ ),
+ elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp)
+ ) {
+ Column(modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {
+ Text(
+ text = statusMessage,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
+ color = accentColor,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
+ )
+ downloadProgress?.let { progress ->
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
+ LinearProgressIndicator(
+ progress = { progress },
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .clip(RoundedCornerShape(10.dp)),
+ color = accentColor,
+ trackColor = if (isDarkMode) DarkSurface else SoftLavender
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Messages List
+ val listState = rememberLazyListState()
+
+ LazyColumn(
+ state = listState,
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
+ contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)
+ ) {
+ if (messages.isEmpty() && currentModelId != null) {
+ item {
+ WelcomeMessage(
+ isDarkMode = isDarkMode,
+ onStartAssessment = { viewModel.navigateTo(Screen.HealthAssessment) }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ items(messages) { message ->
+ MessageBubble(message, isDarkMode)
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Auto-scroll to bottom when new messages arrive
+ LaunchedEffect(messages.size) {
+ if (messages.isNotEmpty()) {
+ listState.animateScrollToItem(messages.size - 1)
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Input Field
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(16.dp),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(25.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = surfaceColor.copy(alpha = 0.9f)
+ ),
+ elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(16.dp),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ TextField(
+ value = inputText,
+ onValueChange = { inputText = it },
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
+ placeholder = {
+ Text(
+ "Ask about nutrition...",
+ color = if (isDarkMode) DarkText.copy(alpha = 0.6f) else MutedPlum.copy(
+ alpha = 0.6f
+ )
+ )
+ },
+ enabled = !isLoading && currentModelId != null,
+ colors = TextFieldDefaults.colors(
+ focusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
+ unfocusedContainerColor = Color.Transparent,
+ focusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
+ unfocusedIndicatorColor = Color.Transparent,
+ cursorColor = accentColor,
+ focusedTextColor = textColor,
+ unfocusedTextColor = textColor
+ ),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp)
+ )
+
+ FloatingActionButton(
+ onClick = {
+ if (inputText.isNotBlank()) {
+ viewModel.sendMessage(inputText)
+ inputText = ""
+ }
+ },
+ modifier = Modifier.size(48.dp),
+ containerColor = accentColor,
+ contentColor = Color.White,
+ elevation = FloatingActionButtonDefaults.elevation(
+ defaultElevation = 6.dp
+ )
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = Icons.Default.Send,
+ contentDescription = "Send",
+ modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for bottom nav
+ }
+}
+
 @Preview(showBackground = true)
 @Composable
```

package com.runanywhere.startup_hackathon20

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.background
import androidx.compose.foundation.clickable
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.rememberLazyListState
import androidx.compose.foundation.rememberScrollState
import androidx.compose.foundation.selection.selectable
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.CircleShape
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.foundation.verticalScroll
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Add
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.AccountCircle
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Send
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment

import androidx.compose.ui.draw.clip

import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color

import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.text.style.TextAlign
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
